    • 构造器详细资料

      • Wavemangement

        public Wavemangement(int[] waves_duration,
                     double[] waves_pre_wave_pause,
                     java.lang.String[] waves_pre_monsters_type,
                     double[] waves_pre_monsters_hp,
                     int[] waves_pre_monsters_speed,
                     double[] waves_pre_monsters_armour,
                     double[] waves_pre_monsters_mana_gained_on_kill,
                     int[] waves_pre_monsters_quantity,
                     Mana mana,
                     GameSet set)
        The constructor of Wavemangement.
        参数:
        waves_duration - An array of wave durations in seconds.
        waves_pre_wave_pause - An array of pre-wave pause durations in seconds.
        waves_pre_monsters_type - An array of monster types for each wave.
        waves_pre_monsters_hp - An array of monster health points (hp) for each wave.
        waves_pre_monsters_speed - An array of monster speeds for each wave.
        waves_pre_monsters_armour - An array of monster armor values for each wave.
        waves_pre_monsters_mana_gained_on_kill - An array of mana gained on killing monsters for each wave.
        waves_pre_monsters_quantity - An array of monster quantities for each wave.
        mana - The mana resource used to control the game.
        set - The game settings.
